string.name: ai_image_privacy_message
string.Data:
"Welcome to AI Portrait!
To be able to provide services to you, we need to collect the necessary personal information:
%1$s. To create portraits with AI, you'll have to upload photos of people to our servers. We'll collect and process the information about their faces to generate an AI model.
%2$s. When you upload photos of people, we'll sync their names and profile photos from the corresponding albums and associate this information with AI Images.
%3$s. When you create AI Images based on text, we'll collect the description you provide in order to generate images.
We only collect personal information that is necessary for the specific features of our products and services that you use. You can learn how we collect and process personal information in the AI Portrait Privacy Policy.
Read and agree to AI Portrait User Agreement and AI Portrait Privacy Policy before you continue."
